title: 84x3: Application of 18 U.S.C. §§ 203, 205, 208, and 209 to Employee's Outside Law Practice
summary: Advised employee about application of 18 U.S.C. §§ 203, 205, 208 and 209 to his outside practice of law as a member of a law firm (after agency approved the outside employment). Describes prohibitions he would be subject to under each statute.
